data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: Neyland is often referred to as one of the best, if not the best, defensive football coaches ever. Sports ____ named Neyland as ____ defensive ____ of ____ all-century ____ football ____ in ____ `` Best of ____ 20th Century '' ____. In 112 of ____ wins, the ____ team ____ not ____ a ____. In 1938 and 1939, Neyland's team ____ NCAA ____ when ____ did ____ allow a point ____ 17 ____ games. His 1939 team is the last NCAA team in history to hold every regular season opponent scoreless.
data.partBlankContent: Neyland is often referred to as one of the best, if not the best, defensive football coaches ever. Sports Illus______ named Neyland as t__ defensive coord______ of i__ all-century col____ football te__ in i__ `` Best of t__ 20th Century '' edi____. In 112 of h__ wins, the ot___ team d__ not sc___ a po___. In 1938 and 1939, Neyland's team s__ NCAA rec____ when th__ did n__ allow a point i_ 17 stra____ games. His 1939 team is the last NCAA team in history to hold every regular season opponent scoreless.
data.answer: 尼兰德经常被认为是有史以来最好的防守足球教练之一，如果不是最好的话。《体育画报》(Sports illustrated)在“20世纪最佳”(Best of the 20th Century)版中，将尼兰任命为全世纪大学橄榄球队的防守协调人。在他赢得的112场比赛中，对手一分未得。在1938年和1939年，Neyland的球队创造了NCAA的记录，他们连续17场比赛一分未得。他在1939年的球队是NCAA历史上最后一支常规赛对手均无失分的球队。
